findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward(), _getCurrentSupply, and scalculateExcludedSupply() use loops that can cause OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Potential issue with migrateToken() function
findings.description: The function migrateToken() uses the _transferStandard() function to transfer tokens from the contract to address from the function’s argument. If contract address or income address would be excluded from reflection this will be a high issue.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change various settings and withdraw tokens even after ownership renouncement.
